definition: Xiahe county in Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘南藏族自治州[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: Riot policemen stand guard the main square of Xiahe town Gansu province March 17, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 鎮暴警察在甘肅省夏河縣的主要廣場站崗。
